original_text: They were also to stand every morning to thank and praise the Lord. They were to do the same in the evening
korean_text: 아침과 저녁마다 서서 여호와께 감사하고 찬송하며

sentences.original_text: They were also to stand every morning
to thank and praise the Lord
They were to do the same in the evening
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 저녁에도 동일한 일을 해야 했습니다
